EmailTemplate.description: Keurig Coffee Offer for Ford Dealers
EmailTemplate.name: Keurig Coffee Offer for Ford Dealers
EmailTemplate.subject: Keurig Coffee Offer for Ford Dealers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
As your Office Depot Account Manager, I want to personally make you aware of a special offer on Keurig® K-Cup® Brewing or a Bolt® Carafe available exclusively to you as a member of the Ford Rotunda program.
Attached you will find additional details. Please don't hesitate to contact me directly if you have any questions.
Lisa Creamer GPO Account Manager | Office Depot, Inc. 9501 Amberglen Blvd. Suite 200 | Austin, TX 78729 Tel: 855.337.6811 | Ext. 12651 | Elisabeth.Creamer@officedepot.com
Customer Service 888.263.3423
https://business.officedepot.com
